title: Ford suspends production of F-150 trucks
text:
Ford suspends production of F-150 trucks 01:12
Ford has temporarily stopped producing its F-150 trucks because it run out of parts after a fire at a key parts supplier for the best-selling vehicle in the U.S. Aleksandra Michalska reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Ford has temporarily stopped producing its F-150 trucks because it run out of parts after a fire at a key parts supplier for the best-selling vehicle in the U.S. Aleksandra Michalska reports.
